celeste-martin.name: Celeste Martin
celeste-martin.bio: Celeste Martin is an Assistant Professor at Emily Carr University of Art + Design. She has a background in communication design, and specialises in typography, researches at the university’s Social Interactive Media Centre, and is the editor of the award-winning design research journal Current

20.title: Dynamic typography in digital publication design

neil-kandalgaonkar.name: Neil Kandalgaonkar
neil-kandalgaonkar.bio: “Sometimes, when a typeface I like becomes popular, I want to say ‘I loved you first.’” Neil Kandalgaonkar helped make that thing you like on the Internet. Google, Upcoming, Flickr, Wikipedia. Before that, he designed type.

20.title: Undesigning Cherokee syllabary: Restoring the usability of a Native American writing system
